purpose: Feature finalization and production readiness validation
description: Feature finalization and production readiness validation system that orchestrates comprehensive quality assurance, deployment preparation, and production readiness verification for completed features.

feature.description: Feature or component to finalize for production

--production-ready.details: Validates feature is ready for production deployment with all quality gates

--deployment.details: Creates deployment scripts, configuration, and validation procedures

--rollback.description: Prepare rollback procedures and safety measures
--rollback.details: Creates rollback plans and safety mechanisms for production deployment

--monitoring.description: Set up monitoring and observability for the feature
--monitoring.details: Configures metrics, logging, and alerting for production monitoring

examples.description: Complete user authentication with production deployment preparation
examples.context: When finalizing critical features for production release

examples.description: Complete payment system with comprehensive production preparation
examples.context: When finishing high-risk features requiring full production readiness
